profile.2fa.disabled: You have not enabled two factor authentication.
profile.2fa.enabled: You have enabled two factor authentication.

profile.2fa.recovery_codes: Store these recovery codes in a secure password manager. They can be used to recover access to your account if your two factor authentication device is lost.
